|brand = D-Link |model = DIR-868L |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1750 |type = wireless router |series = <!-- Device series --> |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2IR868LA1,RRK2012060056-1 |icid = 4216A-IR868LA1,4833A-WMCAC01A1 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 8WRGAC02.1A1G |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4708; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex A9 |cpu1spd = 800 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G100TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = 800 |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Micron;MT47H64M16HR-25E:H; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C8:D3:A3
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, JP1,, |jtag = yes,, 10-pad header,, JP2,,
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks (SiGe);SE5003L;;3; ,,, 5GHz GaAs SPDT Switch;Skyworks;SKY13351-378LF;;3; ,,, 5GHz LNA IC;Skyworks;SKY65404-31;;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = dlink-XXXX,dlink-XXXX-media |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WRG-AC02 |manuf_rev = A1 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = AdvancedTomato, DD-WRT, FreshTomato-ARM, Tomato (Shibby),
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/07/2013 |estreldate = 04/11/2013 |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 790069389719 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00C9VB318 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Alpha Networks WMC-AC01 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (oversized) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360; |rad1oui = C8:D3:A3 |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |rad2oui = C8:D3:A3 |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :{{ProductPage|http://www.dlink.com/us/en/home-solutions/connect/routers/dir-868l-wireless-ac1750-dual-band-gigabit-router}} {{SupportPage|vendor=D-Link|model = DIR-868L}}
*"WRGAC02" and "8WRGAC02.1A1G" is silkscreened on the main board. *"8WMCAC01.2A1G" is silkscreened on the wireless module in the photos. :This device may use BCM47081A0 (one core). It is clearly a BCM4708x SoC. :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM6GD16EWXC-15H (256MB) - (Rev. B1 ?)
Default settings are per the FCC docs... :Per the FCC datasheet, the wireless module is using... *3x [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=969 ''Skyworks'' (''SiGe'') SE5003L] - 5 GHz Power Amplifier ICs *3x [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=711 ''Skyworks'' SKY13351-378LF] - 5 GHz GaAs SPDT Switches *3x [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=676 ''Skyworks'' SKY65404-31] - 5 GHz LNA ICs
{{WiFiCert|WFA18277|11/25/2013}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32110-d-link-dir-868l-wireless-ac1750-dual-band-gigabit-cloud-router-reviewed Reviewed on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.shadowandy.net/2013/08/d-link-dir-868l-wireless-ac1750-dual-band-gigabit-cloud-router-review.htm Reviewed on '''ShadowAndy'''] *[http://foxnetlab.com/index.php/16-reviews/91-dir-868l-or-the-first-router-with-support-of-802-11ac-by-d-link Reviewed on '''FoxNetLab''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== *[https://wiki.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/D-Link_DIR-868L '''DD-WRT'' FW]
===Flashing Tomato=== *[http://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/d-link-dir-868l-another-great-arm-router-supported-by-tomato.70489/ '''Tomato (Shibby)''' FW]
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery caption="from D-Link"> Image:D-Link_DIR-868L_front_cloudlol.png|front w/ mydlink cloud logo Image:D-Link_DIR-868L_front.png|front Image:D-Link_DIR-868L_back.png|back </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==Hardware Modification== ===Disassembly=== The case is held together by 6 screws. :3 are on top, under the golden sticker ring :3 are on the bottom, under the feet
==See also== *[[D-Link DIR-850L rev A1]] • [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32184-d-link-dir-850l-wireless-ac1200-dual-band-gigabit-cloud-router-reviewed SNB review] *[[D-Link DIR-860L rev A1]] • [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32211-d-link-dir-860l-wireless-ac1200-dual-band-gigabit-cloud-router-reviewed SNB review] :[[Alpha Networks WMC-AC01]] :[[Alpha Networks WMC-AC02]]
